The user infuses [[Storm Release]] with [[senjutsu]] [[chakra]] to fire a sharp, thin stream of light from their mouth. It is powerful enough to cut clean through a [[Truth-Seeking Ball]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 674, page 4</ref> As it travels at the speed of light, it is described as being impossible to dodge.<ref name="d4" />

== Trivia ==
* In the [[Naruto: Colour Edition|coloured manga]], this technique is depicted white in colour.
